# filter(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the elements of `self` that satisfy `isIncluded`.

## Declaration

```swift
func filter(_ isIncluded: @escaping (Self.Elements.Element) -> Bool) -> LazyFilterSequence<Self.Elements>
```
